[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”8090″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”PROJECT EXPORTS” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059250987{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”What Do We Do ?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059282910{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”AVS perceives an opportunity in commodities and helps to exploit the opportunity which is suited to local conditions thereby providing maximum profit margins to it business partners.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059296642{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We manufacture and fabricate specialised vehicles like fire tenders and aircraft refuellers apart from supplies of all large, medium and small fire-fighting equipment.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605059615739{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7506″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1605059434031{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1605014468016{margin-top: 40px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1605059737166{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”]

Executing international projects, exports, imports, and to act as dealers, vendors, authorized dealers for different commodities in both international and domestic trade.

Manufacturing of specialized Vehicles including Fire Fighting and Rescue Vehicles and Fuel Refillers of various capacities.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1605059748459{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”]

To carry on the business of buying, selling, import, export of merchandise, to take government-to-government contracts, and to do trading in different types of commodities.

Manufacturing of all leather products through its subsidiaries or sister concerned.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”World markets have thrown open a new avenue for entrepreneurs to participate by doing commodities. Commodities actually offer immense potential to become a separate asset class for entrepreneurs, and we are duty bound by its social commitments to help entrepreneurs in the process of starting a business in countries that it operates, by offering innovative products, process support and service backup as desired by any new start up. AVS perceives an opportunity in commodities and helps to exploit the opportunity which is suited to local conditions thereby providing maximum profit margins to it business partners.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-section”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our current field(s) of activities” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”]

Specialized vehicle fabrication of all types.

Provisioning of Fire Tenders and all associated fire safety equipment.

Facilitation / consultations for overseas turnkey projects.

Bulk trading of A4 Copier Paper.

Export of bulk Wood charcoal for heating and cooking to international clients from Ghana.

Import of bulk teak wood from Ghana.

Bulk export of Detergent Powder suited for hard water.

Manufacturing and distribution of commodities in entire ECOWAS.

Manufacturing of AVS branded Military Boots / Civil Security Boots / Mens Formal Shoes / Industrial Safety shoes.

Provisioning bulk requirements of Military Uniforms, Civil Security Guard uniforms and accruements.

Export of bulk Wood charcoal for heating and cooking to international clients from Ghana.

Facilitation of I T solutions as on required basis.

Provisioning `Anti-Riot Personal Protective Equipment’.

Upstream and Downstream Hardware integration for Oil & Gas

Soap Opera production

Agro businesses

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Through our clients and channel partners we have been making supplies to reputed end users i.e. Ghana National Fire Services, County Government of TANA River, Kenya, French Army, Qatar Airways, Dubai Police, Sri Lanka Police, Kenya Police, and All the departments of Government of Ghana. Majority of our revenues comes from turnkey government funded projects and execution of projects throughout EXIM Line of Credit.
We manufacture and fabricate specialised vehicles like fire tenders and aircraft refuellers apart from supplies of all large, medium and small fire-fighting equipment. In the year 2014, we executed a Pilot Project for Millennium Development Authority in Ghana by supplying Fire Tenders under EXIM Line OF Credit, making it the Asia’s largest exporter in the segment for that year, and we have never looked back since then.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1603789577439{background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR MISSION” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:32px” google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1603791023539{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-2-5″]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Provide integrated trade, services and project solutions and serve them as an effective and accountable solution provider.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1604746041296{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”GET IN TOUCH” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:64|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604576678569{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-2-5″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Leave us a message” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:left|color:%23800080|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604321558634{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”letterspacing-1″]

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”India Office” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:left|color:%23800080|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1608915362443{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”letterspacing-1″]

    [vc_custom_heading text=”Ghana Office” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20|text_align:left|color:%23800080|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1608915377894{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”letterspacing-1″]
    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604988132578{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”HEAD OFFICE” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604988367250{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    AVS Group, 2nd Floor, DC Nand Plaza, Sadar Bazaar,

    Agra, Uttar Pradesh – 282001 (India)

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    Contact No.: +91-9997016488, +91-9717097883
    Email ID: info@avsgroup.in

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604988224618{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”PRODUCTION UNIT” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    32/76 Mauja Bagh Rajpur, Shaheed Nagar,

    Agra, Uttar Pradesh – 282001 (India)

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    Contact No.: +91-9997016488, +91-9717097883
    Email ID: info@avsgroup.in

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604988443237{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”GHANA OFFICE” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    AVS India Ghana Limited
    La – Trade – Fair Center,  Accra Ghana  (On the Bank Lane)

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    Contact No.: +233 27 889 4333
    Email ID: ghana@avsgroup.in

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604988607614{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”KENYA OFFICE” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    AVS Kenya
    P.O. Box 95810-80106, Mombasa

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text font_size=”16″]

    Contact No.: +254 714 308443
    Email ID: kenya@avsgroup.in

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-section” parallax_background=”” css=”.vc_custom_1604144266039{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 95px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR SOCIAL” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:32px” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-2-5″]
